trans-unit.source: Converts task-returning asynchronous methods into methods that use the asynchronous programming model used in previous versions of ASP.NET and that is based on begin and end events.
trans-unit.target: 将转换任务返回为使用 ASP.NET 的早期版本中使用的异步编程模型和基于的方法的异步方法开始和结束事件。

trans-unit.source: To handle asynchronous tasks in ASP.NET 4.5, you implement the logic to return a task as a <xref:System.Web.TaskEventHandler> delegate.
trans-unit.target: 若要处理 ASP.NET 4.5 中的异步任务，则实现逻辑以返回将任务作为<xref:System.Web.TaskEventHandler>委派。</xref:System.Web.TaskEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: This model of asynchronous task-based programming supersedes the model used in previous versions of ASP.NET, which bases all event handling on begin and end events.
trans-unit.target: 此模型基于任务的异步编程将取代以前版本的 ASP.NET，所有事件处理上开始和结束事件的基中使用的模型。

trans-unit.source: After you implement a <xref:System.Web.TaskEventHandler> delegate, you can then pass it to the <xref:System.Web.EventHandlerTaskAsyncHelper.%23ctor%2A> constructor, which wraps the task-returning logic and converts the handler to the model that uses begin and end events.
trans-unit.target: 在实现后<xref:System.Web.TaskEventHandler>委托时，你可以然后将它传递到<xref:System.Web.EventHandlerTaskAsyncHelper.%23ctor%2A>构造函数，它包装的返回任务的逻辑，并将该处理程序转换为模型使用开始和结束事件。</xref:System.Web.EventHandlerTaskAsyncHelper.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Web.TaskEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: The EventHandlerTaskAsyncHelper class enables your <xref:System.Web.TaskEventHandler> object to be compatible with the ASP.NET page framework.
trans-unit.target: EventHandlerTaskAsyncHelper 类可实现你<xref:System.Web.TaskEventHandler>才能与 ASP.NET 页框架兼容的对象。</xref:System.Web.TaskEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: When you call the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.AddOnPreRenderCompleteAsync%2A> method to process the task for an asynchronous page, you can use the <xref:System.Web.EventHandlerTaskAsyncHelper.BeginEventHandler%2A> and <xref:System.Web.EventHandlerTaskAsyncHelper.EndEventHandler%2A> properties to pass the converted begin and event handlers to the method.
trans-unit.target: 当调用<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.AddOnPreRenderCompleteAsync%2A>到进程任务的异步页的方法，你可以使用<xref:System.Web.EventHandlerTaskAsyncHelper.BeginEventHandler%2A>和<xref:System.Web.EventHandlerTaskAsyncHelper.EndEventHandler%2A>属性，以便传递给该方法已转换的开始和事件处理程序。</xref:System.Web.EventHandlerTaskAsyncHelper.EndEventHandler%2A> </xref:System.Web.EventHandlerTaskAsyncHelper.BeginEventHandler%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Page.AddOnPreRenderCompleteAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.EventHandlerTaskAsyncHelper"></xref> class.
Represents the <xref href="System.Web.BeginEventHandler"></xref> method for an asynchronous task.
The method that handles the begin event for the asynchronous task.
trans-unit.target: 处理异步任务的开始事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref href="System.Web.EndEventHandler"></xref> method for an asynchronous task.
The method that handles the end event for the asynchronous task.
trans-unit.target: 处理异步任务的结束事件的方法。
